full_output.summary: Bringing hands-on experience from numerous projects and internship, I'm a full stack developer with proficiency in React, Node.js, Express and MongoDB and an Android Developer with expertise in Flutter, Dart. I'm eager to apply my academic knowledge to real-world projects and I'm open to embracing new technologies as they come. I am looking for more opportunities that can hone my skills in technical department.
